content: Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Are you able to tell -- one of the comments I think you've made in the past is that, in a tight environment a client might actually issue RFPs more broadly, kind of fishing for price, so to speak, in a way that would kind of artificially inflate the RFP flow to the industry, perhaps, and that's something that you have to be wary of is are you able to tell if, like, you mentioned in your response to Eric that decisions were down in 2Q.
